alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued June 21 at 10:05PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY... WHAT...Surf heights of 13 to 16 feet WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Dangerous breaking waves, deadly rip currents, and localized beach erosion Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1005 PO ASO LULU IUNI 21 2023 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LAPATAIGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 13 i le 16 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunuu. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi AAFIAGA...Dangerous breaking waves, deadly rip currents, and localized beach erosion FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O lapataiga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Faiva po o le ona o le siisii o tulaga o sami ma galu, e le tatau i le au fai mamalu lautele ona fagogota pe maimoa i galu. O i latou i le matafaga, e mafai ona maua faafuaseia e galu.
info.instruction: A high surf warning indicates dangerous large breaking waves will pound the shoreline in the warning area, producing deadly rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
